title: Roles of Future Libraries and Teaching-Learning Support Strategies: Applying the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A course for graduate students and job seekers that strengthens practical competencies through project-based assessments using mobile-accessible microlearning modules.

learning_goals: Propose improvements for library services utilizing the five phases of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation).
Explain at least three new roles university libraries can play in teaching-learning processes during the digital transformation era.
Complete team-based library service innovation projects using collaboration tools in a mobile microlearning environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
